title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: Gamification-Based Educational VR Simulations for Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce scientific experiment procedures with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.

Learners can design three or more problem-solving scenarios applying scientific concepts (e.g., conservation of energy, gravity) using gamification mechanisms (experience points, leveling up, reward systems) and achieve an average score of 4 or higher out of 5 on a peer-assessment rubric (creativity, scientific accuracy, integration of game mechanics).
Learners can analyze complex scientific scenarios through collaboration and propose optimal solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
